bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yan ji 眼疾 , ailments of the eyes. Yi xue qi yuan 醫學啟源 Lj: 草龍膽，氣 寒，味大苦，治兩目赤腫睛脹，瘀肉高起，痛不可忍，以柴胡為主，龍 膽為使，治眼中疾必用藥也 , “ Cao long dan , its qi is cold; its flavor is very bitter. It serves to cure eyes that are red and swollen, with the eyeball protruding, and excessive flesh rising. The pain is unbearable. With chai hu serving as ruler and long dan as messenger, for curing ailments in the eyes , these are pharmaceutical drugs that must be resorted to”.
